abstract: The company reported net income of $7 million, or 1 cent a share, on sales of $12.8 billion. It was less profit than analysts had estimated, but the revenue was in line with forecasts.
snippet: The company reported net income of $7 million, or 1 cent a share, on sales of $12.8 billion. It was less profit than analysts had estimated, but the revenue was in line with forecasts.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Leaping revenue, little profit.

headline.main: Amazon Delivers on Revenue but Not on Profit
